channel.title: Development on Spacehuhn Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Spacehuhn Wiki

item.title: Translate Keyboard Layout
item.description: Currently the supported keyboard layouts are: DE GB US ES FR (ASCII only) All standard keys are defined in usb_hid_keys.h. To translate a keyboard layout, you have to match each character on your keyboard to the one(s) of a US keyboard. This stuff is hard to explain in writing and requires a lot of manual work and testing. Copy one of the existing layouts files, like locale_us.h.
